name: Classic Beef and Potato Stew
description: Hearty beef stew with tender potatoes
instructions: Cut beef into 2-inch cubes and season with salt and pepper
Brown beef in a large pot with oil
Add onions and garlic, cook until softened
Add beef broth, tomato paste, and herbs
Continue cooking for 30-40 minutes until vegetables are tender
tips: Let beef rest for 5 minutes after cooking for juicier results
Don't wash mushrooms - wipe them clean with a damp paper towel
Soak cut potatoes in cold water to remove excess starch
